description:
Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:
• The automatic renewal terms stated above.
• The New York Times Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/privacy-policy
• The New York Times Cookie Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/cookie-policy
• The New York Times California Privacy Notices: http://www.nytimes.com/privacy/california-notice
• The New York Times Terms of Service: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/terms/terms-of-service.html

* Promotional offers for new subscribers only. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS
* Read or Listen? Whatever your mood and the situation calls for.
* Enjoy stories anywhere, any time.

BOOK CLUB
* Join the discussion online with our vibrant Book Club community
* Join our Facebook group: https://bit.ly/3j9af5g
* Follow us on Instagram: @galatea.stories

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING
* Turn on the Dark Mode for cozy night reading

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS
* Support Galatea writers by purchasing chapters.
* For unlimited access to all of our stories, we have subscription packages!

LANGUAGES
* English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese… more on the way.

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)
By using Galatea, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines (https://getgalatea.com/terms/) and to our Privacy Policy (https://getgalatea.com/privacy)

Hey there, story lovers! Looking for a perfect romance novel? Or would you prefer to dive into the paranormal world? Whatever your preferences are, we’ve got you covered. My Passion is exactly the place where you can indulge inthousands of the best books: romance, mystery or fantasy novels that will make your world become topsy-turvy.

Here’re just a few TAGS & GENRES among dozens we have:
Werewolf
Billionaire
New Adult
Hot
Romantic
Paranormal
Marriage
Suspense
Fan fiction
and others

FEATURES
- Immerse yourself into the fiction world with free samples.
- Add favorite books to your personal library and manage reading time.
- Download chapters and enjoy offline reading ebooks.
- Get relevant book recommendations.
- Customize your reading experience (font, light/dark mode, etc.)

SPECIAL OFFERS
Daily Rewards. Claim coins for 6 days and get your Super Gift.
Reading Rewards. Read on our platform for 15 minutes to claim coins.
Earn coins for watching ads and creating the account.

All books on My Passion are personal & somewhat heroic life trajectories of the protagonists. Our avid readers feel at ease, “unconstrained” & “amused” when they read our novels.

New episodes released every day
Exclusive novels & Steamy stories
Award-Winning Authors

Privacy Policy - https://passion-app.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/documents/PassionPrivacyPolicyMay2021.docx.html

Subscription terms - https://passion-app.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/documents/PassionAppSubscriptionTermsMay2021.docx.html

Terms of service - https://passion-app.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/documents/PassionTermsofUseMay2021.docx.html

Get fearless, independent journalism with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:

My Guardian - Your own custom feed of your favourite topics and writers, so you can follow the stories you care most about. 

Puzzles - Whether you're looking for classics like Soduku and Crosswords, or fun word games like Wordiply and Word wheel, we have the puzzle for you. 

Podcasts - Listen to our award-winning podcasts directly in the Guardian app. 
 
Listen to Articles - Can't read our articles? Listen to them instead. You can get realistic audio transcription of every article we publish - excluding live blogs. 

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience – so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you. Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you’re a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you’ll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading – download articles to explore on the go

What’s more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

All content in the Guardian app is copyright Guardian News & Media 2025. All rights reserved.

Our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy apply when accessing content via the Guardian app.

Privacy Policy: http://www.theguardian.com/help/privacy-policy

Terms of Service: http://www.theguardian.com/help/terms-of-service

If you subscribe to the Guardian app, our subscription terms will also apply https://www.theguardian.com/info/2023/feb/24/the-guardian-news-app-terms-conditions. Your subscription will auto renew and you will be charged before the next renewal date unless you cancel.

developer: RADIO I TELEVIZIJA BOSNE I HERZEGOVINE
description:
BHRT, Javni radiotelevizijski servis Bosne i Hercegovine

Odlučni da zajedno doprinesu uvođenju evropskih standarda u medijsku praksu Bosne i Hercegovine;

Uvjereni da su načela međunarodnih, profesionalnih konvencija i kodeksa, te nova normativno-pravna dokumenta koja reguliraju status i funkcije javnih elektronskih emitera u BiH, dovoljan sadržajni okvir za utvrđivanje pravila ponašanja, i saglasni da je, slijedom pozitivnih iskustava u djelovanju javnih medijskih servisa u razvijenim zemljama, potrebno
ustanoviti zajednička uređivačka načela i okvire profesionalnog rada novinara javnih servisa u BiH, Upravna tijela, poslovodstva i uposlenici Javnog radiotelevizijskog servisa Bosne i Hercegovine, Radiotelevizije Federacije Bosne i Hercegovine i Radiotelevizije Republike Srpske donose.

Get all your news in one place on an eye-opening platform that shows you the bias, reliability and ownership of every source you read. Cut through the noise and escape media echo chambers with Ground News.

Ground News is the largest news aggregator in the world with over 50K news sources and 60K articles added daily. But we aren’t a typical news aggregator, throwing hundreds of headlines at you that barely skim the surface. Ground frees people from algorithmic restraints, illuminates blindspots and makes media bias explicit with our one-of-a-kind media analysis features.

AVOID MANIPULATIVE ALGORITHMS
SPOT MEDIA  BIAS
DISCOVER BLINDSPOTS
CHECK THE RELIABILITY OF SOURCES
SEE WHO OWNS THE NEWS YOU CONSUME

Read daily breaking stories from sources around the world, in real time. Like a modern day newspaper, we show you diverse stories instead of algorithm-driven content that can limit your worldview. News coverage is rarely unbiased, so we give you as much context as possible so you can come to your own conclusions. Compare coverage on partisan topics like politics, and elections.

Enjoy our free features, or subscribe for in-depth analysis that will transform the way you look at news.


About Your Ground News Subscription: 
Subscriptions renew monthly and can be managed through your App Store account
Payment will be charged to your App Store Account on confirmation of purchase
Renewal is automatic unless turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
Subscriptions can also be managed through Ground News by going to your Account Settings after purchase 

See full terms and conditions here: https://ground.news/terms-and-conditions

Ostanite u tijeku s najnovijim vijestima, događanjima i aktualnostima iz Općine Sveti Martin na Muri.
Otkrijte raspored kulturnih, sportskih i lokalnih događaja.
Pronađite važne informacije i korisne poveznice na jednom mjestu – od općinskih usluga do turističkog sadržaja.
Primajte obavijesti o najvažnijim vijestima i budite prvi koji zna što se događa u vašem kraju.
Jednostavno, transparentno i uvijek ažurno – sve što trebate znati o Svetom Martinu na Muri sada je na dohvat ruke!

LetMeKnow – AI Summarized News is a news aggregator app that shows stories and articles with short AI summaries. Have a newsfeed with breaking news (local & global), as well as reports and stories per your interest curated and digested productively.

Tap on any article to experience an intuitive news reader that showcases all sources, key points, and AI news summaries.

Join discussions, vote, or make polls. Spread the truth, share your beliefs, and point out the manipulation and lies.

Digest curated content smartly and enjoyably with LetMeKnow.

---- AI NEWS SUMMARIES WITH PERSONALIZED FEED, SOURCES, POLLS, DISCUSSIONS ----
Forget about RSS feeds or newsfeeds that are complex and long. Instead, read important global news from the world’s best publications or local news from smaller publishers. All summarized by AI.

■ STORY CLUSTERING
LetMeKnow takes publications about a story/event from 3000+ sources and showcases it to you as one. No more seeing the same story over and over again. Once you tap on a story you are interested in you will get:
- title, key points, and AI summary
- the number of sources and links to all sources
- the bias of the media/publication

■ AI SUMMARIZED NEWS
Save time by reading stories with AI summaries. LetMeKnow harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to distill lengthy articles into concise, easy-to-digest summaries.

■ PERSONALIZED NEWSFEED
Select the topics that you're interested in, and our AI news app will curate a custom feed of articles based on your preferences. Whether you are liberal, democrat, conservative, or republican, you can customize your news feed with ease.

■ DISCUSSIONS & POLLS
Engage with the news like never before! Whether it’s global news or local news, you can create polls and participate in discussions about articles directly within the news summary app. Share your thoughts, gather opinions, and be part of a vibrant community that values diverse perspectives and debates.

■ LOCAL NEWS
Our brief news app also includes breaking local news for major US cities. Simply select the location and the topics you want to receive local US news about.

■ CHANNELS
Go to the channels section to read articles with AI summaries from the sources you trust and about the topics you are interested in.

■ FILTER NEWS BY BIAS
Browse news only from one bias (left, center, and right) to dive deep into the meaning or read from media that matches your beliefs, principles, and political orientation.

■ LETMEKNOW NEWS APP FEATURES:	
• AI summarized news
• similar articles are grouped and all sources are shown including their bias
• AI-generated key points and a summary of the story/event
• local and global news coverage
• browse all unbiased news or filter news by bias – left, center, right
• discussions, voting, polls, and poll maker
• synced newsfeed across devices
• flexible notifications to get breaking news per your interest
• save, like, and share articles within the newsreader

Experience a new world of curated, engaging, and personalized news.
►  Download and use the LetMeKnow news aggregator with AI news summaries for free.

Forbes Hrvatska dio je dvije velike medijske međunarodne mreže, United Medije, koja u svojem portfelju ima više od 120 medija, i medijske grupe Forbes, koja je prisutna u nekoliko desetaka zemalja širom svijeta i od svog osnutka 1917. godine predstavlja važnu referencu u poslovnom svijetu.
 
Forbes Hrvatska je počeo s radom 14. studenog 2023. godine, istovremeno kao i Forbes Slovenija, Forbes Srbija, Forbes BiH i Forbes Crna Gora, u okviru United Media, koja posjeduje licencu za digitalna Forbesova izdanja u ovom dijelu Europe.
 
Tim Forbesa Hrvatska čine profesionalni urednici i novinari koji na jasan i objektivan način obrađuju događanja u svim područjima gospodarskog djelovanja, od javnih financija do najnovijih tehnoloških i life style trendova. U fokusu su ljudi, oni koji pokreću procese, koji su inovativni ili poduzetni. Urednici i novinari rukovode se visokim standarima profesije koje propisuje Forbes kodeks.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app
- Profiles of actors with their full filmography
- Simple and user-friendly application interface
- Browsing history
- No account required

Disclaimer: 
In the application, you cannot watch films and series for free, but you can find in the application a complete description of the series and films and also the service on which you can watch them.

All movies information and images are from TMDB.org licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/

This app uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb: https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/terms-of-use

Hooligans.cz is your gateway to the raw and unfiltered side of the sports world. Dive into a constantly updated stream of articles, photos, and reports covering the global scene of football fan culture, ultras movements, and clashes between rival supporters.

Whether you're a hardcore fan, a curious outsider, or simply passionate about the intense atmosphere surrounding stadiums, Hooligans.cz brings you closer to the action. Our content covers everything from high-profile derbies and international incidents to underground fan stories that rarely make mainstream news.

Key Features:

Real-time blog updates from Hooligans.cz

Exclusive articles and eyewitness reports from matches and fan events

High-quality photos and videos capturing the true spirit of ultras and hooligan culture

Clean, mobile-friendly design for easy reading on the go

What You’ll Find:

Matchday chaos, fan choreographies, and crowd actions

Interviews and behind-the-scenes insights from the fan world

Historical retrospectives on the most iconic fan clashes

Global coverage: from Europe’s fiercest rivalries to South American terraces

Stay informed. Stay connected. And experience the other side of football.

Download Hooligans.cz and join the underground heartbeat of football.

Bloomberg Adria 

The first multimedia business platform in the region with hubs in Belgrade, Ljubljana, Sarajevo, Skopje and Zagreb, dedicated to providing in-depth regional news and market coverage. 

Going beyond the headlines: Bloomberg Adria analysts and journalists provide expert insight into causes, context and consequences. Bloomberg Adria answers not just the question of why something happened but also what its effects will be. 

As a licensed partner of Bloomberg Media, Bloomberg Adria adheres to the highest standards of journalism to ensure fairness and accuracy. Bloomberg Adria is the trusted destination for financial news from around the region while also leveraging the unmatched global resources of Bloomberg for the bigger picture 

Bloomberg Adria aims to strengthen regional economies by informing, inspiring and empowering financial professionals, decision makers, future leaders and the wider business community 

Bloomberg Adria is the platform for timely and relevant conversations on regional business and finance and provides a forum for essential executive networking 

 

FEATURES: 

News: Browse featured and trending stories in Business, Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Foreign and Regional Affairs, Personal Finance, Analysis and more from 120+ global and 7 regional newsrooms. 

Market Data: Get the latest financial data to enable fundamental analysis, including stock prices, futures, bonds, commodities & foreign currencies. 

Alerts: Receive push notification alerts on the latest briefings on the financial economy and the biggest business headlines. 

- Video & Audio: Stream Bloomberg Adria TV and get insights from the smartest names in Finance, Business, Economics & Investing, plus discover our catalogue of videos.




Terms and conditions: https://rs.bloombergadria.com/p/2/uslovi-koriscenja/

Espresso from The Economist is the faster, smarter way to know the news. Power through the world’s top stories in the time it takes to have a cup of coffee, with incisive analysis updated throughout the day. 

The Espresso app is now free for students. Here is what people say about Espresso:
“If all you have each day is a few minutes and you're tired of the 24hrs news cycle mostly regurgitating the same info all day everyday, the Espresso helps distil the cacophony of news each day into a single powerful update.”

What you’ll get:
- Top stories for quick analysis
- “The World in Brief” news summary updated three times a day
- Five bite-size articles offering finishable 1 minute reads 
- Audio versions of articles to enjoy hands-free
- Daily podcasts and short videos offering fresh perspectives on current events
- A zingy blend of Figure of the day, Quote of the day and Chart of the day
- Selected news stories from the weekly edition in the “For you” tab

Features:
- Time to read highlighted on each article
- Adjustable text size
- Personalize your topic preferences
- Dark mode for more comfortable reading
- Mobile and tablet-compatible
- Enable notifications

Topics covered:

- Africa
- Finance
- Economics
- Science
- Technology

FORBES Bosna i Hercegovina je portal u okviru internacionalne Forbes medijske grupe sa sjedištem u Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama.

Magazin Forbes je osnovao B.C. Forbes 1917. godine, a 1996. godine pokrenuta je i online platforma, Forbes.com, a najviši novinarski standardi, kvalitetno i pouzdano novinarstvo za Forbes su konstanta od samih početaka pa do danas.

Internacionalna mreža Forbes portala danas je prisutna na nekoliko kontinenata, u više desetaka zemalja, a 30.10.2023. startala je i regionalna Forbes mreža (Bosna i Hercegovina, Hrvatska, Slovenija, Srbija, Crna Gora) čiji je izdavač Adria News Sarl sa sjedištem u Luxembourgu, kompanija koja je dio United Media Group, vodeće medijske grupacije u jugoistočnoj Europi.

Forbes Bosna i Hercegovina se rukovodi najvišim novinarskim standardima Forbes grupacije, a u fokusu su teme iz područja biznisa, poduzetničke prakse, događaji i trendovi na bosanskohercegovačkoj i ekonomskoj sceni, predstavljamo najuticajnije menadžere u zemlji i regiji, no isto tako prenosimo i prezentiramo bh. javnosti i izbor najzanimljivijih tekstova i informacija iz regionalne i globalne Forbes mreže.

Bhakundo: Your Football Hub

Discover the ultimate football experience with Bhakundo, your one-stop hub for everything football! Stay updated with the latest action, news, and insights from the world of football, all in one app. Bhakundo is designed for football enthusiasts who want to stay connected with their favourite sports, leagues, and teams.

Comprehensive Game Coverage
Live Updates: Receive real-time updates on ongoing matches, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.
Schedules and Reports: Access detailed schedules and past game reports for all major tournaments including Eurocup, Worldcup, Copa America, Champions League, La Liga, Premier League, and more trending leagues worldwide.
Extensive Tournament Coverage: Get detailed information about various football tournaments from around the globe, all in one place.

Live Game Information
Real-Time Details: Get real-time information about live games, including minute-by-minute updates, scores, and key moments.
TV and Streaming Info: Know where to watch the games with live information about TV channels and streaming platforms broadcasting the matches, so you never miss a game.

Extensive News and Stories
Latest News: Stay informed with the latest news covering every event in the world of football. From match previews to post-match analyses, Bhakundo keeps you updated.
Transfer Market Updates: Get the latest updates on player transfers, including rumours, confirmed deals, and expert analysis.
Player Stories: Dive deep into the lives of your favourite football players with exclusive stories and interviews.
Match Reports: Read detailed pre- and post-match reports to get insights into team strategies, player performances, and game outcomes.

Personalized Experience
Custom Feeds: Personalize your feed to get all the games and news about your favourite team in one place. Bhakundo’s personalized feature ensures you never miss an update about the teams you love.
Team Alerts: Set up alerts for your favourite teams and receive notifications about their latest news, match updates, and more.

Multilingual Support
Language Options: Enjoy Bhakundo in both Nepali and English, with more languages coming soon. Experience football in your preferred language and stay connected with the global football community.
User-Friendly Interface: Bhakundo offers a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to switch between languages, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience for all users.

Why Choose Bhakundo?

With comprehensive coverage of all major leagues and tournaments, real-time updates, personalized features, and multilingual support, Bhakundo ensures you are always in the loop. Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Forbes Srbija je licencno izdanje Forbes grupacije, globalnog lidera u svetu poslovnih vesti. Deo je United Media grupe, koja okuplja više od 120 medija u Srbiji i regionu jugoistočne Evrope.

Portal Forbes Srbija počeo je s radom 14. novembra 2023. zajedno s redakcijama Forbes Slovenija, Forbes Hrvatska, Forbes BiH i Forbes Crna Gora. Jedino smo licencno izdanje Forbes koje ima i svoju televizijsku emisiju.

Tim Forbes Srbija čine profesionalci koji na jasan i objektivan način izveštavaju o najvažnijim ekonomskim temama u našoj zemlji, regionu i svetu.

U fokusu su uspešni ljudi, oni koji inspirišu i pokreću promene. Donosimo savete kako da i sami izgradite poslovnu karijeru ili sopstveni biznis. Primenjujemo najviše novinarske standarde u istraživačkim pričama i pozivanju institucija na odgovaran i efikasan rad.

Everything you love about Vogue - anytime, anywhere. Get the news, shop the latest trends, and connect with fellow fashion obsessives from around the world with the Vogue app.

On the Vogue app, you can:
- Get the inside line on the top stories from Vogue editors.
- Engage with fellow fashion enthusiasts in discussions on your favorite topics.
- Shop editor-approved buys and the latest trends all within the app.
- Test your runway IQ with our daily Runway Genius quiz.
- Discover new topics to join the conversation across the globe.
- Never miss a story by following Vogue editors and contributors and exploring their latest posts.
- Take a front row seat at every international show.
- Explore our archive of 20,000+ fashion shows by designer, season, location and type
- Browse 1 million+ runway images— dating back to 1988—with AI-powered image search.
- Vote on your favorite looks, then see how your selects stack up to the Vogue community.
- Save looks and collections to your mood boards, with advanced organizational tools.
- Get a close-up look at all the details from Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, and so much more.
- Follow your favorite brands and topics so you never miss a Vogue moment.
- Share your favorite looks and collections with others via email, text, and social media.
- Browse thousands of photos capturing street style worldwide, shot by our renowned photographers.
- Read reviews from Vogue’s internationally recognized writers for our insider take.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited digital access to Vogue Runway. Users need to be logged in and subscribed to access Vogue Runway content. All Vogue subscribers will have unlimited digital access to the app as part of their existing subscription. App subscribers have full access to the Web site. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail appfeedback@vogue.com for assistance.

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

Faça o download grátis da PLAY Games e compre edições avulsas ou assine diretamente do seu iPad, iPhone ou iPod Touch. 

• Assinatura auto-renovável PlayStation - Revista Oficial 

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/ 


Caso você seja assinante da revista impressa, basta entrar no app com seu e-mail e código de assinante para acessar suas revistas digitais gratuitamente. 

Qualquer dúvida, entre em contato com a nosso suporte técnico pelo e-mail: suportedigital@europanet.com.br
